api

Class PSPortSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • api.PSPortSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PSPort, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PSPortSSL, PSPortTCP

    public abstract class PSPortSocket
extends java.lang.Thread
implements PSPort
    Abstract class of PSPort. This class is the main part of the API.
